items.html: The character retreats into their mind and becomes paralyzed. The effect ends if the character takes any damage.
The character becomes incapacitated and spends the duration screaming, lauging, or weeping.
The character becomes frightened and must use their action and movement each round to flee from the source of the fear.
The character begins babbling and is incapable of normal speech or spellcasting.
The character must use their action each round to attack the nearest creature.
The character experiences vivid hallucinations and has disadvantage on ability checks.
The character does whatever anyone tells them to do that isn't obviously self-destructive.
The character experiences an overpowering urge to eat something strange such as dirt, slime, or offal.
The character is stunned.
The character falls unconscious.
Being drunk keeps me sane.
I keep whatever I find.
I try to be like someone I know, their style of dress, mannerisms, and name.
I bend the truth, exaggerate, or outright lie to be interesting to other people.
My goals are the only thing of interest to me, and I'll ignore everything else.
I find it hard to care about anything that goes on around me.
I don't like the way people judge me all the time.
I am the smartest, wisest, strongest, fastest, most beautiful person I know.
Powerful enemies are hunting me, and their agents are everywhere. I am sure they're watcmaxng me all the time.
There's only one person I can trust. And only I can see tmaxs special friend.
I can't take anything seriously. The more serious it is, the funnier I find it.
I really like killing people.
